name: The worst rpg maker xp game to ever exist
name_original: The worst rpg maker xp game to ever exist
description:
This is the worst rpg maker xp game to have been ever made

This is my first game so if you notice any bugs , mistakes or any tips to improve the game please contact me and i'll do them whenever i can.
